Unit Converter Lite is a free mobile application developed by Lite Mobile Tools. This Privacy Policy explains how information is handled when you use our app.

By using the Unit Converter Lite app, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.

**Information Collection and Use**

Unit Converter Lite is designed to work offline and does not require any registration. You can simply install the app and start using it for unit calculations.

ðŸ”’ We do not collect, store, or share any personal information.

Specifically:

 * We do not collect names, email addresses, phone numbers, or any personal identifiers.
 * We do not require users to create an account.
 * We do not collect usage data, location data, or device information.
 * We do not use cookies or tracking technologies.

**Personal Information**

We do not collect personal identification information from users at any time. You can use the app completely anonymously.

**Non-Personal Information**

Unit Converter Lite does not collect non-personal information such as device details, operating system, browser type, or internet service provider information.

**How the App Works**

All calculations are performed locally on your device. No data is transmitted to our servers or any third-party services.

**Sharing of Information**

Since we do not collect any user data, there is no information to sell, trade, rent, or share with third parties.

**Third-Party Services**

Unit Converter Lite does not use third-party analytics tools, advertising services, or external SDKs that collect user data.

**Childrenâ€™s Information**

Unit Converter Lite does not knowingly collect any information from children under the age of 13. As no data is collected at all, the app is safe for users of all ages.

**Changes to This Privacy Policy**

Lite Mobile Tools may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be reflected on this page with an updated revision date. We encourage users to review this policy periodically.

**Your Acceptance of This Policy**

By installing and using Unit Converter Lite, you signify your acceptance of this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with this policy, please do not use the app.
